cast.name: 克里特·安努艾德奇康 Krit Amnuaydechkorn
奈哈·西贡索邦 Naphat Siangsomboon

writer.name: 普昂索·阿克松萨旺 Puangsoi Aksornsawang

director.name: 萨萨瓦·洛斯里特  Sasawat Loesrit

this_title: เส้นเรื่องเดิม
introduction: 发现他们对音乐有相似的品味，基特和周开始一起去听音乐会。他们的关系不断发展，直到最初的吸引力开始消退，其背后的意义也随之消失。~~灵感来自PP krit amnuaydechkorn(พีพีกฤษฏ์อำนวยเดชกร).)的歌曲《重新运行》Finding that they have a similar taste for music, Kit and Chou start to attend concerts together. Their relationship grows until its initial appeal starts to fade, and the meaning behind it becomes lost.~~ Inspired by the song "RERUN" by PP Krit Amnuaydechkorn (พีพี กฤษฏ์ อำนวยเดชกร)
foreign_title: เส้นเรื่องเดิม
